channel.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
channel.description:
Trade the shop keeper at? I just made this shop to sale barrows armor and when i click trae or talk nothing happens?? What do i do to enable it to work?
-Sorry for all the questions, i just started understanding and doing a sever by my self today =)

item.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
item.dc:creator: @cody123 cody123
item.description:
@cody123 wrote:

i found it and did everything compiled successfully but still the guy will not trade ,?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 03:05:56 AM[/size][hr]whats wrong with it?

Read full topic
item.source: I have a shop i made that i cant

item.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

[quote=“NexondotNet, post:2, topic:117586”]Find -

case 155: //first Click npc

Scroll down until you see all the npc shops - eg.

else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; // Black Armour Shop }

Use this method to apply a shop -

else if (NPCID == YOUR NPC ID){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = YOUR SHOP ID; }

Find -

case 17: //Second Click npc

Again, do the same thing.[/quote]

This is what you do…

Read full topic
item.source: I have a shop i made that i cant

item.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
item.dc:creator: @cody123 cody123
item.description:
@cody123 wrote:

ooo i got it… not case 17 is like confusinger… can you post a code showing me where to add that code in at ???

Code:
} else if (NPCID == YOUR NPC ID){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = YOUR SHOP ID;
}

Read full topic

item.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

I never told you to change it… I told you that you can add a new shop by adding this -

else if (NPCID == YOUR NPC ID){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = YOUR SHOP ID; }

Read full topic

item.title: I have a shop i made that i cant
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Find -

case 155: //first Click npc

Scroll down until you see all the npc shops - eg.

else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; // Black Armour Shop }

Use this method to apply a shop -

else if (NPCID == YOUR NPC ID){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = YOUR SHOP ID; }

Find -

case 17: //Second Click npc

Again, do the same thing.

Read full topic
